Row.Text: [BLIST][LI][B]All Warehouse buildings[/B] apply to [B]Mountain Terrain[/B] tiles, but they cost +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Maintenance. [LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Boudhanath[/B].[/LIST]
+30% Production from being the Nepal's unique wonder.
All Warehouse buildings apply to Mountain Terrain tiles, but they cost +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Maintenance.
